summary: This is an email exchange regarding the handling of subpoena returns in the Epstein case. An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York requests that returns from an attached document be added to a shared location and a spreadsheet be updated.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of an email requesting that subpoena returns be processed and tracked.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 18, 2020, concerning the Epstein case.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY is directing the handling of subpoena returns.
The request involves adding returns from an attachment to a shared location and updating a tracking spreadsheet.
This indicates ongoing procedural activity in the case in mid-2020.
